long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knowing weather made attractive. Get the weather reports in form of awesome GIF images. Just open the extension and plan your day according to the weather outside. This provides you with weather report and 5 day forecast in a fun and interesting way.
